Class PlotLiveApplet

java.lang.Object

                      ptolemy.plot.PlotApplet
                          ptolemy.plot.PlotLiveApplet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer
public class PlotLiveApplet
extends PlotApplet

An Applet for the PlotLive class. Derived classes should redefine newPlot() to return a concrete instance of PlotLive.

Since:
Ptolemy II 0.2
Version:
